item.title: CRM
item.description: score:-45 Chances: Salesforce Inc (NYSE:CRM) reached $276.88 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a +0.04% change compared to its last close. Rising corporate spending on digital transformation projects has boosted CRM stock. With the Slack deal closed, merger synergies will be key.
